data.Name: Jason Crabb
data.Bio: Jason Crabb is the oldest son of the group The Crabb Family. The group decided to disband in 2007 and pursue other ventures. Crabb's passion for Christian music and entertaining carried him far past the bands retirement. He was signed to Spring Hill Music Group in 2009 and released a self-titled debut solo album June 30, 2009. On September 28, 2010, Spring Hill Music Group released Jason's second solo project, a Christmas album titled Because It's Christmas. Read more on Last.fm
